resources.string: Advanced settings (change options after stopping music)
* Click on the lyrics to switch the clock and lyrics
Lyrics are not displayed on the lock screen and the rest screen
Auto hide lock screen carrier name
Broadcasting cannot be used, please turn on this switch (Storage space isolation, please set relevant permissions)
* Custom Hook (do not move if you don\'t understand)
After LSPosed is activated, the SystemUI needs to be restarted to take effect
If there are some inexplicable problems, please click here
Thank you list (in no particular order)
Click to view the list of thanks
If you find it easy to use, please support me

Please read this one-time warning carefully! 

 Sorry to take your time. 
 Please check whether the software version is correct! 
 If it does not take effect, please re-optimize the software
 If the module does not take effect, please open debug and restart SystemUI, attach the log, and go to Github/Telegram for feedback.

Application:

 Flyme obtains lyrics:
 -QQ Music
 -Migu Music
 -Meizu Music
 -NetEase Cloud Music
 -Support Flyme lyrics that is support
 -I donâ€™t know the minimum version yet, feedback is welcome


Traditional Hook method of obtaining lyrics:
(mark the most suitable version)
 -APlayer: v1.5.7.9
 -Kugou Music: v10.9.2
 -Kuwo Music: v10.0.3.0
 -QQ Music: v10.17.0.11 (additional Bluetooth connection is required)
 -Migu Music: v7.6.1 (additional Bluetooth connection is required)
 -NetEase Cloud Music: v7.2.22
 -NetEase Cloud Music: v8.6.13
 -NetEase Cloud Music: v8.6.26 (additional Bluetooth connection is required)
 -Other versions may also be compatible, please self-test


Active application adaptation:
(mark the version to start adaptation)
 Salt and Pepper Music: v4.5
 Phonograph Plus: v0.0.2v0.0.3
If the lyrics cannot be displayed, please try to stop the music software and restart the SystemUI\n or check the instructions for use. Are you using the correct version?
Initialization failed, please restart the software
Failed to get the latest version download address:
Check failed, please try again later!

Configuration file error
 It may be that the content of the file is missing or the configuration file has been upgraded
 May cause unnecessary problems
 Whether to reset
(-1~100, -1 is off, only takes effect when the lyrics width is adaptive), currently:
Please enter the hexadecimal color code, for example: #C0C0C0, currently:
The default hook has been restored, please restart SystemUI
Are you sure to restart the system interface?
If you suddenly find that you cannot use it during use, you can try to restart the SystemUI.
Do you want to reset the module
The module is OK, please don\'t reset it at will
Please activate storage permissions,used to store the lyrics icon\n Otherwise, this module cannot be used normally\n If you don\'t trust this module, please uninstall
Go to settings to grant permissions
Version description The content has been updated

Module notes

 The module is perfectly used in the official Rom, the official change may cause problems


Modules no longer support modules other than Lsposed
 If lsp cannot find this module, please upgrade lsp


If the lyrics cannot be displayed
 Please restart the system interface and make sure the module switch is turned on
 Use Flyme to get the lyrics: please make sure the lyrics in the status bar of the music software is turned on
 Use traditional hook to get lyrics: please make sure the music software version is correct
 If Flyme cannot get the lyrics through the method of obtaining lyrics, please switch to the traditional Hook method of obtaining lyrics


The function changes with * need to restart the system interface


If the module does not take effect, please open debug and restart SystemUI, attach the log, and go to Github Telegram for feedback. 


Known bug:
 The music software exits abnormally, the lyrics will not disappear automatically
Xposed not supported\n or the module is not activated\nforce stop the software after activation
Use Meizu Way to Get Lyrics
Cannot get lyrics using Meizu method, please turn off this switch
